Combining Stat Results
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Combining Stat Results
By mean2you on Sunday, March 13, 2011 - 08:31 am:

Just a quick question on how high the stats come out after combining.

I have 2 arrowheads, both 1st gen only used silver peach thats all.
LIF 999
POW 999
INT 218/187 (Stat of 2nd arrowhead)
SKI 999
SPD 201/181 (Stat of 2nd arrowhead)
DEF 999

I haven't kept the combined result cause it seemed pretty underwhelming.

What are good stat results after combining?

Never bothered trying to max all stats and wanna have a go now.

Thanks for the help =)

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, March 13, 2011 - 04:28 pm:

Usually, if combined during prime, and with a Great combo, you'll get one stat at 325+, two at about 250, and the rest in the usual 75-120 range.

Tech carryover is sometimes more important, because you won't waste a ton of lifespan getting techs.

By mean2you on Monday, March 14, 2011 - 12:32 am:
